snippet.title: Game Gear Longplay [039] Sassou Shounen Eiyuuden Coca-Cola Kid
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Mad-Matt

Released only in japan, this platform game that seems to use the same engine that sonic game gear/sms was built on. Fan translated into English. Initially I tried to show where secret area are, but this gets to annoying in later levels. The collectibles add nothing to the game anyhow. As you progress you unlock powers to help get you through the stages. Towards the end, the controls become a real hindrance as the game demands pixel perfect jumps. The ending is typical of Japanese games Wink -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
